edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc
Class DocConfig

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc.DocConfig
public class DocConfig
extends java.lang.Object

An object representation of the doc_config.xml descriptor file that a BackEndLSP built on the sdarts.backend.doc package uses to configure itself. The format for the configuration file is described in the text_config DTD.

This descriptor tells the BackEndLSP whether to re-index the collection every time the BackEndLSP is instantiated (re-indexing includes building a meta-attributes and content-summary), what paths to look for documents in, whether these paths are recursive, what extensions the document filenames have, what is the linkage, stopwords, etc.

The DocConfig also includes one or more DocFieldDescriptors, which describe the fields in a document and how to parse them.

A DocConfig is instantiated by loading it from the stored file using a DocConfigBuilder instance.
